title: Cow in Ibn Sirin’s dream interpretation

preview.html: The cow in the dream interpretation refers to people of religion and goodness. Cows in a dream indicate years and years, and a fat cow in a dream indicates a fertile year of goodness. Drought and a woman of little faith. Interpretation of a cow in a dream for a single woman: For an unmarried woman in her dream, a cow symbolizes her luck in marriage. If the cow is beautiful, it means a good and soon marriage. As for the cow in the dream of the single B, it is weak and weak, and it is present in the interpretation of visions and the interpretation of dreams according to Ibn Sirin, a symbol of hatred and lack of luck in marriage. The white cow is an engagement, and the white and black cow is a job for the girl. Interpretation of a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for a pregnant woman in the first months of pregnancy, seeing a cow in her sleep or in a dream is a good vision and a source of optimism, especially if the cow is beautiful, calm, and grazes in a wide, green place. Pregnancy Without problems, as for the newborn, it is male if the cow is dark in color, while the cow is bright, it is a sign of female status. Interpretation of a cow in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a cow in a dream for a married woman is a sign of joy and happiness. It is a symbol of happiness if it is fat and indicates a year in which there is plenty of nourishment. Seeing a cow in a married woman can mean pregnancy and can indicate money, income and livelihood that the husband will reap that year and the cows that year. A wife's sleep is about her good family, her good neighbor, her safe environment, her stable home, or anything related to family and household, and often cows show the health of children, and milk is food for them. A lot in a married woman’s dream means peace, and cow dung is the money that a married woman earns. The meaning of a white cow in a dream. A white cow in the interpretation of a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, shows the year of marriage for Aziza B. It is a sign of a man’s wealth, and a white cow in a student’s dream indicates an academic certificate or success and evidence. A white cow represents money and abundance, and it is one of the signs of goodness in everyone’s dreams, and buying it is evidence of profit. Dear or precious. Interpretation of slaughtering a cow in a dream. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of slaughtering a cow in a dream that it indicates the divorce of a married woman and the annulment or postponement of an honorary marriage b.or his journey in search of money, livelihood, and success in work and study. And trade, and the blood or blood of cows is good, as it indicates the disappearance of worries and the disappearance of psychological exhaustion or illness. Interpretation of a cow giving birth in a dream The birth of a cow in a dream is one of the signs of the year in which a desire is fulfilled and a person fulfills his desire, and it is one of the visions classified in dream interpretation as visions and prophetic dreams for it. A married woman with her and a married woman who has not given birth will become pregnant soon. As for a pregnant woman who sees a cow calf in her dream, this means that it will be easy to give birth and give birth, and a man who sees in a dream a cow giving birth and giving birth to a beautiful calf, this means improvement in his religion, knowledge, and work. Al-Baqarah The woman running behind you will chase you and haunt you in your sleep. If you see in your dream a cow chasing you, then this is a woman with

title: Interpretation of the birth of twins in a dream and the dream of the birth of twins

preview.html: Seeing the birth of twins in a dream symbolizes many good things and blessings. Whoever sees that he has given birth to twin boys in a dream, this means that he will obtain his livelihood after a lot of struggle. Seeing the birth of twins in a dream indicates ease and comfort, and whoever sees that she has given birth to twins, a girl and a boy in a dream, this indicates that she will have multiple livelihoods and work, and God knows best. Interpretation of the birth of twins in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that he sees the birth of twins in a dream with kindness and abundance to live for, and whoever sees That he gave birth to real twins in a dream, this indicates comfort and relief from great worries. Seeing the birth of non-identical twins in a dream symbolizes survival from deception and deception. The dream shows the presence of bond and assistance in crises. Whoever hears about the birth of twins in a dream, this indicates that he has heard two good news. Seeing the birth of twins for a well-known woman in a dream indicates that she will gain wealth and a high status if she is not pregnant. The birth of twins in a dream for a poor person is evidence of his wealth, For the benefit and relief, for the debtor to pay off his debts, for the traveler to facilitate his affairs, and for the unmarried person, it indicates haste. Marriage. Aborting twins in a dream indicates instability in life. Whoever sees that she aborted twins and bled in the dream, this indicates the serious losses that he will be exposed to. Seeing the process of aborting twins in a dream means losing money and livelihood, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins. Seeing the birth of two twin girls in a dream. A dream means comfort and relief from sadness, and whoever sees that she gave birth to identical twins in a dream, this indicates relief from distress, and seeing twins born differently in a dream means paying off the debt, and dreaming of giving birth to twins and breastfeeding them. He declares that he will assume new responsibilities and commit to them. Whoever dreams of giving birth to twin girls with the disease indicates his constant anxiety, and seeing the birth of two conjoined girls in a dream indicates the presence of someone who stands by the viewer and supports her in adversity and distress. If you see that you gave birth to twin beautiful girls in a dream, this indicates On consolation and repentance, seeing ugly twin girls in a dream indicates corruption in religion. Whoever sees her friend giving birth to twin girls in a dream, this indicates her way out of distress and distress, and a dream of giving birth to two girls for someone else indicates a way out of distress with the help of others. Interpretation Dreaming of giving birth to twins: Seeing the birth of twins in a dream indicates following a difficult diet. Whoever sees that he is giving birth to thick-haired male twins in a dream, this indicates an increase in nutrition and ability after nourishment. Dreaming of giving birth to male twins with colored eyes indicates joy after sadness and anxiety, and a vision indicates birth. Beautiful twins in a dream indicate an increase in status and prestige. The birth of male twins by caesarean section in a dream indicates a way out of distress and distress with the help of others. The birth of sick twins in a dream indicates a disturbance in the source of livelihood, and whoever sees that he was born with deformed twins in a dream, this indicates that he is bitter. In difficult circumstances. Interpretation of a child’s vision

title: What you do not know about the dream of geese in the dream of major scholars

preview.html: Seeing geese in a dream: Geese are one of the types of birds that are very similar to ducks, but with a long neck and a loud, bass voice. They are distinguished by their bright white color and often live in ponds or lakes, but a person sees them in a dream while hunting. Geese or eating their meat is good, but hearing their voice can be a bad omen. Let us learn to interpret this in detail in the following lines by major interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing geese in a dream When you see geese in a dream, this is a sign of progress in various positions in the field. Working or getting a promotion in the current period or showing progress in the academic ranks and obtaining scholarships abroad. If a person is poor and sees this, then it is a sign of wealth and enjoyment of money...abundance in the current period that enables him to buy a house and a luxury car. Interpretation of a dream about a goose. And if If a person suffers from a disease and eats goose meat, this is a sign that he will recover from that disease and enjoy health and well-being again, and if he will travel and see that, this is a sign that he will. Live a happy life later. But when hearing the sound of geese is a sign of sadness or hearing some sad news at that time, such as the death of a relative or friend and entering a state of misery, and if the geese are barking constantly at home, then it is a sign of divorce or separation that leads to the family being dispersed. Interpretation of the vision Geese in a dream for a single girl and a married woman When an unmarried girl sees that someone has given her a goose in a dream, this means that one of her relatives has offered her a prestigious position and made her live a decent life. The Egyptian website is the largest dream interpretation website in the Arab world. All you have to do is write Google Egyptian dream interpretation site and get the correct interpretations. Geese in a dream for a married woman. And if the married woman is the one who sees this, then she may have expressed a desire to prepare delicious food for her family members and take care of them in the best possible way. Sources:- 1- The Book of Selected Words in Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. 3 - The book “Perfuming the Dreams” as an Expression of a Dream by Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi.

title: Apologizing in a dream, and the meaning of someone apologizing to you in a dream

preview.html: Forgiveness is a noble and praiseworthy behavior because it expresses the purity of the human soul and its endowment with the virtue that accompanies tolerance in social relations. But what does an apology mean in a dream? It is praiseworthy or hateful behavior in a dream. We will explain all the details related to seeing an apology in a dream in this article, so follow us. Apology in a dream Forgiveness in a dream is one of the good visions of the fortune teller and symbolizes tolerance and forgiveness. Apology in a dream symbolizes the recognition of a mistake or regret due to an action or something in real life. Perhaps an apology in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's escape from a calamity that may happen to him. It may also symbolize his exemption from debts and problems that plagued him at that time. Perhaps an apology in a dream symbolizes the desire to achieve balance in one's life and may require honesty in some cases. The interpretation of a dream of an apology in a dream sometimes symbolizes the dreamer's need to review some of his assumptions or positions. As for an apology in a dream, if it is from someone else and directed to you, this symbolizes a mistake or mistreatment from that person. Or perhaps this person does not trust you, and God knows best. But if the apology in the dream is written or a written apology, it symbolizes uncertainty about something or something. Perhaps seeing an apology in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's need to be a little careful in his dealings with some people. The interpretation of an apology in a dream for a married woman symbolizes death and the end of problems or disputes that she has been suffering from recently. However, if the apology in the dream is from the children and directed to the mother, this symbolizes their failure to fulfill their duties. Similarly, the interpretation of the dream of apologizing in a dream can symbolize a request for forgiveness and pardon, especially if it is one of the parents. As for the apology in a dream, if it is from the father to his son or from a teacher to his student, this is unusual and unfamiliar, as it symbolizes the anger and stubbornness of that person. A person apologizing to you in a dream As for seeing a person apologizing to you in a dream, it is a vision of kindness and blessing for the seer. It symbolizes obtaining a benefit or benefit from the dreamer that brings him good and abundant money from that person. To see a person apologizing to you in a dream for an unmarried woman, this symbolizes taking advantage of this person and may be her future husband. But if the person apologizing is your lover, the apology here is a symbol of compatibility, giving and mutual affection between the two lovers. If the dreamer is an unmarried young man and sees a girl apologizing to him in a dream, this symbolizes Her intense love for him and her attachment to him. Interpretation of a dream about a husband apologizing to his wife ... with all interpretations is an indication that this wife will receive benefits and allowances from her husband. The interpretation of a dream that a husband apologizes to his pregnant wife is very similar to its interpretation for a non-pregnant woman, as it brings her good and benefit from her husband. It can sometimes symbolize an easy birth and a safe and secure birth. Interpretation of a dream about an enemy apologizing. As for the interpretation of a dream about apologizing to an enemy or a person with whom you have a dispute or disagreement, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about helping a sick person

preview.html: Also, helping the needy is a beautiful and special thing. Dreaming about helping people, whether they are in need or not or sick, is a topic that has many and varied interpretations. We will present to you in this article, follow us well. Interpretation of a dream about helping a sick person in a dream. The dreamer who sees in his dream that he is helping a sick person. Evidence of That he will get rid of his despair, and that the dreamer’s life will be stable. The dreamer’s vision knows that he is helping a sick person. Expressing that this patient will recover soon, God willing. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he is helping a sick person in general. Evidence of achieving the goals desired by the owner The vision. Interpretation of the vision of refusing help. The person who sees in a dream that he does not want to help someone. An expression of sadness at the arrival of the dreamer, and God knows best. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he does not want to help someone. It is considered evidence that the dreamer is exposed to a financial crisis. Seeing the dreamer in a dream That he helped someone and then received this help. It expresses the dreamer’s loss of that person and that he will regret it. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a married woman. Interpretation of dreams with the help of someone I know by Ibn Sirin. Seeing someone in a dream is considered help in getting rid of sorrows and worries. The dreamer’s ability To achieve the goals that he wants to achieve. Whoever sees in a dream that he is helping a girl from his relatives. Evidence that the girl needs help and you should contact this girl. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is asking for help from someone while smiling. An expression that indicates That this person is connected to the girl and needs her constantly. The girl who sees in a dream the young man she loves but does not want to help her, and at the same time helps another girl. What proves that this person is cheating on her, and God Almighty knows best. The dreamer who sees his mother in a dream is considered good and expresses About goodness. If the mother wants to help her, this is evidence of the mother missing her son and ignoring him. The dreamer who sees his dead mother in his dream needs help from her son. It is something that indicates that the dreamer is sad for his mother and needs her. See also: Interpretation of seeing the coast in A dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about helping someone in a dream about a man. A man sees in his dream that he is providing assistance to many members of his family. Expressing that he will obtain a great livelihood, and that he will be able to fulfill his desires. In the event that a man sees in a dream that he needs help from a family member An expression that this person is responsible, and that they trust him a lot. The time when the dreamer sees that he is providing a lot of material assistance to many people. Elements to get rid of the difficulties that the dreamer is going through. And his life will become very stable in the coming period. As well as seeing the person asking for help from Others. Evidence that he feels lonely, and that he needs a lot of help, whether in his life in general or in his work. If a man sees that there is a beautiful woman, then he does what she asks, a sign of good things. If an unmarried young man sees that there is A beautiful woman fulfills any request, this is evidence that he will get married soon.Vision

Evidence of achieving the goals desired by the owner The vision. Interpretation of the vision of refusing help. The person who sees in a dream that he does not want to help someone. An expression of sadness at the arrival of the dreamer, and God knows best. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he does not want to help someone. It is considered evidence that the dreamer is exposed to a financial crisis. Seeing the dreamer in a dream That he helped someone and then received this help. It expresses the dreamer’s loss of that person and that he will regret it. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a married woman. Interpretation of dreams with the help of someone I know by Ibn Sirin. Seeing someone in a dream is considered help in getting rid of sorrows and worries. The dreamer’s ability To achieve the goals that he wants to achieve. Whoever sees in a dream that he is helping a girl from his relatives. Evidence that the girl needs help and you should contact this girl. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is asking for help from someone while smiling. An expression that indicates That this person is connected to the girl and needs her constantly. The girl who sees in a dream the young man she loves but does not want to help her, and at the same time helps another girl. What proves that this person is cheating on her, and God Almighty knows best. The dreamer who sees his mother in a dream is considered good and expresses About goodness. If the mother wants to help her, this is evidence of the mother missing her son and ignoring him. The dreamer who sees his dead mother in his dream needs help from her son. It is something that indicates that the dreamer is sad for his mother and needs her. See also: Interpretation of seeing the coast in A dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about helping someone in a dream about a man. A man sees in his dream that he is providing assistance to many members of his family. Expressing that he will obtain a great livelihood, and that he will be able to fulfill his desires. In the event that a man sees in a dream that he needs help from a family member An expression that this person is responsible, and that they trust him a lot. The time when the dreamer sees that he is providing a lot of material assistance to many people. Elements to get rid of the difficulties that the dreamer is going through. And his life will become very stable in the coming period. As well as seeing the person asking for help from Others. Evidence that he feels lonely, and that he needs a lot of help, whether in his life in general or in his work. If a man sees that there is a beautiful woman, then he does what she asks, a sign of good things. If an unmarried young man sees that there is A beautiful woman fulfills any request, this is evidence that he will get married soon.Vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crazy dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says: Seeing a crazy person in a dream dead indicates the fortuneteller’s good conditions, and God knows best. Also, seeing the death of a crazy man in a dream indicates the collapse of worries, problems, and strikes that were occurring in the coming days. Also, to see a dead person die a second time and he was crazy shows that the person seeing him is social and that people need new relationships. Interpretation of seeing dead crazy people in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees a dead person in her dream, this indicates her close marriage to a sensible and affectionate person who loves her very much. Also, seeing a dead body in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her success and superiority, which she almost achieved, and God knows best. Also, seeing a dead mad man in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems and his joining a new and good job. Seeing her lover indicates a person’s madness and then he dies, This indicates the worries and problems that she will see in her life. Interpretation of seeing a dead crazy man in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams in her dream of seeing a dead crazy man, this indicates her good condition, her husband’s good condition in his work, and the abundance of livelihood and money. Likewise, if a married woman She saw that her husband had gone crazy, this indicates the death of a member of her family and indicates her pregnancy and the death of her fetus, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a crazy man chasing me in a dream If a married woman dreams of a crazy man chasing her, then this vision indicates happiness, abundant livelihood, and abundance of money. Also, seeing a crazy man Chasing a young child in a dream indicates the difficulties that the dreamer is going through in his life. Also, dreaming of a father who has gone crazy and is chasing his daughter indicates problems, fears, and disagreements that arise. Seeing a stranger chasing an unmarried girl in a dream means a lot of money, marriage, and upcoming marriages. Interpretation of a vision My relative is crazy. If an unmarried woman sees someone she knows is crazy, this indicates many problems that arise and also indicates the death of the unmarried girl, and God knows best. Also, seeing a crazy person in a dream from among her relatives and then recovering, this indicates the cessation of problems and worries in the dreamer’s life and indicates the marriage of the young man. Interpretation of seeing a deceased person losing his mind in a dream. If a man sees his deceased friend in a dream that he has lost his mind, this indicates many delusions, troubles, and misfortunes that he will go through in the coming period. Also, seeing the death of the deceased and his sanctification in a dream indicates the death of the dreamer and the many sorrows and problems that he will experience. He shows it to his relatives, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream in which my daughter hit a single woman married to Ibn Sirin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that my daughter was injured in a dream by Ibn Sirin Mothers should always be patient when dealing with their children, because this is reflected in the behavior of children and they become more aggressive than before, and through websites, to interpret a dream that my daughter was injured in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the topic that we will talk about in This article.Interpretation of the dream that I hit my daughter in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Parents whose interest is in providing advice and guidance to their children, taking care of them, and taking care of their interests, at times when someone is forced to use the method of hitting to discipline the children and has a dream. what did he do. The following is an interpretation of a dream about hitting my daughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a man in a dream hitting his adult daughter means that he wants to marry her and she refuses to obey his orders. Ibn Sirin says that hitting a girl in a dream is a sign of the parents’ desire to discipline the daughter, take care of her interests, and take care of her affairs. If a divorced woman dreams That she hits her daughter, this is evidence that there is good news for the mother and her daughter and that a beautiful event will happen to both of them. Also, seeing a married woman in a dream that she is hitting her daughter is a sign of anxiety and intense fear of her concern and that she is trying to discipline her and give her advice and guidance. If the mother sees in her dream that she is hitting her daughter For an unmarried woman, this indicates that she will receive a lot of goods from her mother, such as money, real estate, or jewelry. When a man sees in a dream that he is beating his married daughter, this is a sign that his daughter is facing problems in her married life and that the father is intervening to solve these problems. See also : Interpretation of a dream about seeing being beaten in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great commentators. Interpretation of dreams that I hit my daughter in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of dreams of a mother beating her unmarried daughter in a dream carries many different clues and indicators, and most of these visions show what the girl gains from her mother. A daughter in a dream for an unmarried woman is as follows: A mother hitting her unmarried daughter in a dream is evidence of the mother’s concern for her daughter, and regardless of her age, she still needs guidance, direction, and care. A mother hitting her unmarried daughter in her dream also indicates That the dreamer will reap a great benefit and that something big will happen in her life that will change the course of things for her. If an unmarried woman dreams that her deceased mother is beating her lightly rather than harshly, this is a sign that the dreamer will receive an unexpected inheritance from her mother such as money or Gold or earth. If a mother sees that she is beating her unmarried daughter in a dream, some scholars interpret this as a strong relationship between them and the girl in reality in obedience to her mother’s orders. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead beating the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams that I beat my daughter for being Married Woman: Some interpreters say that a dream about a mother hitting her daughter during a dream mainly indicates the presence of many psychological pressures and marital problems that the girl is suffering from. T

title: Interpretation of hunting in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a single man fishing for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether with a hook in the net, the big fish, the fish of Ibn Sirin, according to Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others. Interpretation of fishing in a dream. Fishing means earning a living and improving the financial situation. When a person sees fishing, it has many aspects. Likewise, whoever catches fresh fish in its flesh, it is Comfort in his life, his legitimate strength, and his acquisition of money. If the hunting is large and soft in its scale, then it is safe from the deception and hypocrisy of those around it. Whoever proposes to marry a young man, married man, or girl and sees that he is hunting, he will achieve what he wants in his life. Hunting is good and useful, but hunting Very small ones can indicate illness or postponement of goodness for a while. As for catching large and small fish together or seeing them in the same place, this means mixing the joys and sorrows of the fortuneteller, as is the nature of life. If the great ones are more, the joys will be more, and if they are less More sorrows will come, and whoever catches a dead fish, this indicates that he is close to something that he will not obtain. The basic principle in catching fish is that it comes out of the water alive, but to the fortuneteller, catching a dead fish will not do much harm. . He grieves over the loss of something close to him. Whoever catches a fish from the sea or water with his hand or any tool and catches it to eat it directly, it means that goodness and benefit will quickly happen. And whoever catches a fish from salt water and then transfers it to fresh water, this indicates the hypocrisy of someone close to him or known to him. Carrying fresh and freshwater fish after catching it in salt water indicates the presence of a sincere person around him, such as his wife or someone close to him. Whoever returns the fish after catching it in the water, he will abandon a sin and abandon it, or he will attain goodness that he will achieve and not take it. Whoever catches fish in polluted water, Regardless of the size of the fish or whether he did not catch it, it is evidence of the sadness or misery that befalls him while he is cloudy. And whoever takes it from pure water, he shows his good intentions, and benefits from the good of evil, or shows his great benefit, or that he will increase his sustenance with money or trade. And if he has a son So he rejoices over him and honors his son with him. Fishing from very salty water may be an accusation or anger from the Lord against him or from a person with influence and authority or imprisonment for a period of time. As for the one who caught a fish, he found a number of pearls in his stomach, either one pearl in the belly of a fish or more than one pearl. A fish, or more than one pearl in the belly of a fish. A fish that contains pearls indicates his wife. Or a woman will get married, and the pearl indicates that he will get good from her, and she will have a son for him, and if there is more than one pearl, then the number of his children. Sheikh Bin Shirin considers fishing in a dream an expression of success in life, specifically in livelihood, and he mentioned it in his famous book (Maktab al-Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams) Whoever sees in his dream as if the sea is moving. For the purpose of fishing, it is like someone who goes to the market to earn a plentiful livelihood. If the fish is large or a whale, this indicates new money or a new property, but if the fish is small, it will be passed over for dirhams and money. Interpretation of fishing in a dream with a hook Fishing in a dream with a hook indicates sharing An unmarried young man. Interpretation of fishing with nets in a dream: This vision is considered one of the visions interpreted by Jan
